Articles.Content:
Hi

Photos of my SSTO fleet

All these SSTO are "Fuel only climb" to orbit. No need of Oxy, except for Vernor engines, helping for Cobra re- entry. They are equipped with OPT J61 engines and "Nerv" Nuke engines.

The small ship near the Cargo is an AESV bring to orbit in the Cargo hold. It's a science and explorer ship equipped with a lab and 4 Gimballed Atomic Bulb engines mounted on hinges for vertical and horizontal flights that gives 10000DV. It also returns back to Kerbin in the Cargo hold because it is not equipped for atmospheric flights.

3 Blue Eagle passenger SSTO, one standard, one long range and the last one long range equipped with Karbonite mini drillers and a detector. All able to fly an orbit to Mun or Minmus before return to Kerbin. The carbonate equipped is for Laythe.

The RedVulture Cargo SSTO can send to orbit at least 33T of freight at 250kms.

All fleet equipped with docking port and RCS Thrusters, plus Cockpit Vernors for Cobra Re-entry, tested by the pilots, from 60 kms to 28 kms and we can say that overheating on re-entry is not a factor.

Edited January 26, 2016 by gilflo

Nice fleet! Are any mods being used other than the paint? Also can you add more pictures in an album, mainly I would like to see more details of your RedVulture Cargo Craft, the cockpit looks very unique and has my interest, is this a Modded Cockpit and a TweakScale Hull design? Regardless these are nice looking craft designs.

Edited January 26, 2016 by castille7

Thanks!

Painting is just an option When using B9 Aerospace (Aero wing procedural).

Red vulture album here : http://www.hostingpics.net/album/gilflo-265747.html

A lot of mods used

See all aircrafts and mod on KERBALX: http://kerbalx.com/gilflo/RedVulture-AESV

http://kerbalx.com/gilflo/Blue-Eagle-20

Blue Eagle 

http://www.hostingpics.net/album/gilflo-266881.html

on KerbalX you can download them
